channel.title: Database query error on wiki account creation
channel.description:
When trying to create a new account for the Whonix wiki I get the following error:
# Database error
A database query error has occurred. This may indicate a bug in the software.
[33b63f06dfd04c308f8ab5e4] 2020-10-18 17:16:17: Fatal exception of type "Wikimedia\Rdbms\DBQueryError"
Retrieved from "https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Special:CreateAccount"
Which seems pretty similar to 'http://forums.whonix.org/t/creating-wikimedia-account-fails-with-database-query-error/7027'

item.title: Database query error on wiki account creation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Confirmed.

This has been fixed just now.

Read full topic
item.source: Database query error on wiki account creation

item.title: Database query error on wiki account creation
item.dc:creator: LavenderLevitator
item.description:
When trying to create a new account for the Whonix wiki I get the following error:

# Database error

A database query error has occurred. This may indicate a bug in the software.

[33b63f06dfd04c308f8ab5e4] 2020-10-18 17:16:17: Fatal exception of type "Wikimedia\Rdbms\DBQueryError"

Retrieved from "https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Special:CreateAccount"

Which seems pretty similar to ‘Creating Wikimedia account fails with database query error.’
